          <title>
            <string language="en">Circular motion in spin driers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreisförmige Bewegung in den 
Drehbeschleunigungtrockenmitteln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement circulaire en dessiccateurs de rotation</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento circular en secadoras de la vuelta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the components and basic operation of a washing machine's spin drier.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les composants et

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os componentes e a
